Name: SkillMatch
Description: Ensure assigned employees have required skills

Name: RoleCoverage
Description: Ensure each team has exactly one Product Owner and one Scrum Master

Name: TeamSizeLimit
Description: Team size must not exceed organizational cap

Name: SprintDurationFixed
Description: Sprint duration deviation from standard 14 days

Name: BudgetConstraint
Description: Project cost must stay within budget

Name: DeadlineCompliance
Description: Feature delivery delay beyond planned deadline

Name: QualityThreshold
Description: Test coverage should reach at least 80% as a soft target

Name: StakeholderApproval
Description: Stakeholder approval score should be â‰¥4.0

Name: BugCountLimit
Description: Number of post-release high-severity bugs must not exceed 5

Name: RegulatoryCompliance
Description: Number of compliance violations during development
